description: Provides the functionality to export the serverless cache snapshot data to Amazon S3. Available for Valkey and Redis OSS only.

parameters.name: ServerlessCacheSnapshotName
parameters.description: The identifier of the serverless cache snapshot to be exported to S3. Available for Valkey and Redis OSS only.

parameters.name: S3BucketName
parameters.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket to export the snapshot to. The Amazon S3 bucket must also be in same region as the snapshot. Available for Valkey and Redis OSS only.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCacheSnapshot
nested_items.description: The state of a serverless cache at a specific point in time, to the millisecond. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCacheSnapshotName
nested_items.description: The identifier of a serverless cache snapshot. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a serverless cache snapshot. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key of a serverless cache snapshot. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: SnapshotType
nested_items.description: The type of snapshot of serverless cache. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the serverless cache. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the source serverless cache's metadata and cache data set was obtained for the snapshot. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The time that the serverless cache snapshot will expire. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: BytesUsedForCache
nested_items.description: The total size of a serverless cache snapshot, in bytes. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCacheConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the serverless cache, at the time the snapshot was taken. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCacheName
nested_items.description: The identifier of a serverless cache.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The engine that the serverless cache is configured with.

nested_items.name: MajorEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The engine version number that the serverless cache is configured with.
